byline.contributor: Sharon LaFraniere contributed reporting from Prairie View, Tex., and David Montgomery from Austin, Tex.

abstract: Family of Sandra Bland, black woman found dead in Texas jail cell three days after she was arrested during traffic stop, does not believe that she committed suicide, calling for Justice Dept to open investigation into her death.
lead_paragraph: A sister of Sandra Bland described receiving a joyful text message on a Friday, and on Monday, the family was notified of Ms. Bland’s death in a Texas jail.

headline.main: Family of Sandra Bland Seeks Answers With Multiple Inquiries Into Case Underway
headline.print_headline: Family of Sandra Bland Seeks Answers With Multiple Inquiries Into Case Underway

snippet: A sister of Sandra Bland described receiving a joyful text message on a Friday, and on Monday, the family was notified of Ms. Bland’s death in a Texas jail.
